```{r}

```

```{r}
GGally::ggcorr(cor(crime))
df <- data.frame(cor(crime))
View(df)
```

```{r}
model_crime <- lm(formula=crime_rate ~ police_exp59,
             data=crime)
coef(model_crime)
summary(model_crime)
```

```{r}
pred_df <- data.frame(police_exp59=c(120,58,105))
predict(model_crime, pred_df)
```

```{r}
9.222031*120+165.164241
```

```{r}
plot(x=crime$police_exp59, y=crime$crime_rate,
     pch=19, col='blue')
abline(165.164241, 9.222031)
```

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=crime, 
                aes(x=police_exp59,
                    y=crime_rate))+
  geom_point(color='red', size=2)+
  geom_smooth(method='loess', formula='y~x')+
  theme_minimal()
```
